Alias.name: Show all rents
Alias.script:
local rents_db = db:get_database("rents")
local storage = db:fetch(rents_db.storage)
if table.is_empty(storage) then rents:echo("No items found in the rent database.\n", false, true) else cecho(string.format("%-10s<ansi_cyan>%-40s<reset>%s<green>%-40s<gold>%-10s\n", "Name", "Room", "", "Item", "Cost"))
for _, item in pairs(storage) do local crowns = item.cost:match("(%d+) gold crowns") local coppers = item.cost:match("(%d+) coppers") if crowns then crowns = crowns.."g" else crowns = "0g" end if coppers then coppers = coppers.."c" else coppers = "0c" end local cost = crowns.." "..coppers
local msg_format = "%-10s%-40s%s%-40s%-10s\n" if string.len(getRoomName(item.room)) >= 40 or string.len(item.item) >= 40 then msg_format = "%-10s%-40s\n%10s%-80s%-10s\n" end
local msg = string.format(msg_format, item.name, getRoomName(item.room), "", item.item, cost ) cechoLink(msg, function() centerview(item.room) end, "Click to center map on room.", true) end end

Alias.name: Rents show item
Alias.script:
local name = matches[2]
local rents_db = db:get_database("rents")
local storage = {}
if name == "rare" then for _, rare in pairs(rents.rares) do storage = table.n_union(storage, db:fetch(rents_db.storage, db:like(rents_db.storage.item,"%"..rare.."%"))) end else storage = db:fetch(rents_db.storage, db:like(rents_db.storage.item,"%"..name.."%")) end
if table.is_empty(storage) then rents:echo("No items containing the phrase \""..name.."\" found in the rent database\n", false, true) else cecho(string.format("%-10s<ansi_cyan>%-40s<reset>%s<green>%-40s<gold>%-10s\n", "Name", "Room", "", "Item", "Cost"))

Alias.name: Rents delete
Alias.script:
--deletes the ENTIRE rents database
local rents_db = db:get_database("rents") db:delete(rents_db.storage, true) rents:echo("The entire rents database has been deleted.\n")

Alias.name: Rents delete name
Alias.script:
local name = matches[2]
local rents_db = db:get_database("rents")
db:delete(rents_db.storage, db:like(rents_db.storage.name, name)) rents:echo("All items for character \""..name.."\" have been removed from the rent database.\n")

Alias.name: Rents delete room
Alias.script:
local room = getPlayerRoom()
if matches[2] then room = tonumber(matches[2]) end
local rents_db = db:get_database("rents")
db:delete(rents_db.storage, db:eq(rents_db.storage.room, room)) rents:echo("All items for room \""..getRoomName(room).."\" have been removed from the rent database.\n")
